Gadgets

David Granjon

2020-10-27

Source: vignettes/Gadgets.Rmd
Gadgets.Rmd

shinyMobile is particularly well suited to build shiny gagdet. To convert an existing app to a gadget, wrap it in the shiny::runGadget() function.

library(shiny)
library(shinyMobile)
runGadget(shinyAppDir(system.file("examples/tab_layout", package = "shinyMobile")))

Developed by David Granjon, Victor Perrier, Isabelle Rudolf.

Site built with pkgdown 1.6.1.
